title: Create A1 Mart single-page marketing site

requirements.text: Implement a responsive single-page landing site for “A1 Mart” with a sticky top navigation bar that uses in-page anchor links to sections: Home, About, Products, Contact.
acceptanceCriteria: A sticky navigation bar is visible at the top of the page and remains fixed during scroll.
Clicking each nav item scrolls to the correct section (Home, About, Products, Contact).
Layout adapts to small screens (navigation stacks or wraps cleanly at ~700px width).

requirements.text: Apply A1 Mart branding and styling across the page using a professional dark green and cream palette (primary #1A4D2E, accent/background #F5EFE0), with bold typography, rounded cards/buttons, and consistent spacing.
acceptanceCriteria: Primary UI elements (nav, buttons, headings, accents) use #1A4D2E and backgrounds use #F5EFE0 and/or white in a consistent system.
Buttons have clear hover states and rounded styling consistent with the provided HTML concept.
All sections use consistent max-width container spacing and look cohesive on desktop and mobile.

requirements.text: Build the Home section hero with headline, supporting copy, and two call-to-action buttons linking to Products and Contact; include a secondary highlighted panel emphasizing “Trusted by busy professionals” and “for business & beyond”.

quotes: ... Explore products ... Contact us

Trusted by busy professionals – we bring value, variety and reliability.

... for business & beyond

acceptanceCriteria: Home section renders the headline “Shop smart. Thousands of items.” and the description about bags, toys, electronics, clothing.
CTA buttons scroll to Products and Contact sections respectively.
A secondary panel/badge communicates “Trusted by busy professionals” and “for business & beyond”.

requirements.text: Build the About section (“Our story & mission”) with the provided narrative text (founded in 2020, sustainability/fairness, mission statement) and an adjacent trust highlight card (“100% trusted”).

quotes: Founded in 2020, A1 Mart started as a small family venture...

acceptanceCriteria: About section includes heading “Our story & mission” and the three content paragraphs from the provided HTML concept (or equivalent wording in English preserving meaning).
A secondary card/aside is shown with the text “100% trusted” and supporting line.
Section uses a white background (or equivalent contrast) and remains responsive.

requirements.text: Implement the Products section showing exactly four category cards: Bags, Toys, Electronics, Clothing; each card must include an icon, a short subtitle, and a starting price line (“from $19/$9/$29/$15” respectively).

quotes: <!-- SERVICES / PRODUCTS section (exactly 4 categories as mentioned) -->

acceptanceCriteria: Products section renders exactly four cards (no more, no less) for Bags, Toys, Electronics, Clothing.
Each card shows an icon, subtitle text, and the specified starting price.
Cards display in a responsive grid (1 column on small screens; multiple columns on larger screens) with a subtle hover lift effect.

requirements.text: Add the Products section quality banner text: “100% genuine products — fast delivery — easy returns”.

quotes: 100% genuine products — fast delivery — easy returns

acceptanceCriteria: A banner/strip below the product grid displays the exact text “100% genuine products — fast delivery — easy returns”.
Banner uses brand colors and remains readable on mobile.

requirements.text: Implement the Contact section with a functional HTML form that submits to FormSubmit using the exact action URL and hidden fields from the provided HTML, including destination email and redirect URL.

quotes: <input type="hidden" name="_subject" value="New message from A1 Mart website">

acceptanceCriteria: The Contact form includes fields: name, email, message, all required.
Form submission posts to https://formsubmit.co/merealam0786@gmail.com via POST and includes the hidden fields _subject, _captcha, and _next with the exact values provided.
A note below the form states that messages go to merealam0786@gmail.com (in English).

requirements.text: Add a social links row in the Contact section that includes an Instagram button linking to the exact provided URL; include optional secondary placeholder buttons for X/Twitter and Facebook that do not break navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: Instagram icon/button opens https://www.instagram.com/visionxgaming3?igsh=MWFwYjQ2djhzd2UzZQ== in a new tab.
If X/Twitter and Facebook buttons are present, they use safe placeholder href values (e.g., “#”) and do not cause errors.
Social buttons have consistent circular styling and hover states aligned with the brand palette.

requirements.text: Add the extra informational strip section (FAQ / free shipping / visit showroom) as a simple responsive three-item highlight row.
acceptanceCriteria: A section below Contact (or near the bottom) displays three highlights: “FAQ — fast answers”, “free shipping over $50”, and “visit our showroom (by appt)”.
The highlight row wraps cleanly on small screens and maintains contrast.

requirements.text: Implement the footer with the provided 2025 copyright/branding line, a palette note mentioning dark green (#1A4D2E) and cream (#F5EFE0), and a note that a logo will be provided later (using a placeholder for now).

quotes: © 2025 A1 Mart – professional, attractive & trusted online store. Built for busy professionals.
Dark green (#1A4D2E) & cream (#F5EFE0) – colors of reliability.
Logo will be provided – placeholder "A1" used.

acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays the 2025 branding statement for A1 Mart.
Footer includes the palette note referencing #1A4D2E and #F5EFE0.
Footer includes an English note indicating a logo will be provided later and a placeholder is used for now.

requirements.text: Create a coherent visual theme consistent with a premium “dark green + cream” retail brand: set global typography scale, button styles, card radii/shadows, and section background alternation, and apply it consistently across all sections without introducing new product features.
acceptanceCriteria: All components (nav, hero, cards, form, footer) share consistent radius/shadow/typography rules.
The page looks intentional and “premium retail” rather than default template styling.
No additional functional features beyond the described sections are introduced.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not implement third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity (not required for this marketing site).
Backend must remain single-actor Motoko if any backend code is added; however, this build should not require backend changes.
Preserve the exact FormSubmit endpoint (https://formsubmit.co/merealam0786@gmail.com) and the exact Instagram URL provided by the user.
nonGoals: Implementing a full e-commerce system (catalog search, cart, checkout, payments, inventory).
Persisting products or messages in the Motoko backend (contact form submits via FormSubmit).
Creating additional pages/routes beyond the single-page section layout (except what is necessary for the template to run).
Integrating external databases or third-party APIs beyond the provided FormSubmit form post.

preferencesToAdd: Use English for all user-facing text in the application.
